strategy_reasoning: Using the cozy 8-bit aesthetic allows us to present technical updates (merging docs, security patches) as wholesome 'level ups' in a game world. This makes the platform feel inviting rather than intimidating. The carousel format tells a mini-story of improvement.
visual_style: Cozy 8-bit pixel art with chunky sprites, warm lighting, and soft pastel gradients. Prominent use of Pollinations Lime Green (#ecf874) for highlights.
